OpenJIT

Distribution

 

** THE LASTEST VERSION OF OPENJIT IS 1.1.16 **

OpenJIT is distributed under the terms of a BSD-like license.

Supported Environments

OpenJIT-1.1.16 runs on environments as shown below:

  • Solaris 2.6 or later (SPARC)
  • Linux 2.2 (x86)
  • FreeBSD 4.4-RELEASE (sorry, we cannot support 2.2.x at all.)

The snapshot version of OpenJIT runs on environments as shown below:

  • Solaris 2.6 or later (SPARC)
  • Linux 2.2 (x86)
  • FreeBSD 3.3-RELEASE or 2.2.8-RELEASE (x86)

Requirements

To use OpenJIT, Java™ class library and JavaVM™ distributed with JDK 1.1.x are required. Please download JDK 1.1 or later and install it on your system, separately. The current version of OpenJIT was tested on multiple JDK packages as below:

  • Solaris (SPARC)
    • JDK 1.1.8 (Javasoft)
    • JDK 1.2.2 (Javasoft)
  • Linux (x86)
    • JDK 1.1.7v3 (Blackdown)
    • JDK 1.2pre2 (Blackdown)
  • FreeBSD (x86)
    • JDK 1.1.8_ELF.V1999-11-9 (FreeBSD.Org)
    • JDK 1.1.8_AOUT.V1999-11-9 (FreeBSD.Org)
    • Use ports system to install jdk1.2.2 or j2sdk1.3.1.

And to build OpenJIT will require the following tools:

  • GNU C Compiler (version 2.7.2.3 or egcs-1.1.2, or later)
  • GNU Make
